reviews.review: Avengers: Infinity War is overly long and relies on cheap tricks to generate excitement. Performances are good, but I'd say this is my least favorite Marvel movie in recent years.

The problem is that this film is not a movie, but an "episode" in a "movie series" (a good way of making money huh?), so it's not friendly to a newcomer. You have to be familiar with all the numerous previous movies and SHIELD in order to know what these characters are and what happened. And this movie seems to have no climax, so when you walk out of the cinema, you sort of feel "what? That's it? What's the point?" The answer can only be got from the next movie (so it's really a "movie series" by its plot architecture...) .

Avengers: Infinity War is probably my favourite superhero movie, Marvel movie, and maybe my all-time favourite at the moment. It's dark, light, funny, intense, action-packed, and heart-warming all at once. There are so many brilliant moments, and I have no complaints apart from the very minor one of that Captain America doesn't have as much screen time as I'd have liked. 10/10!
This was the best movie to me the only this that i am waiting for now is the 2nd one
One of the best movies I've ever seen. The use of all of the diffrent character, without making it feel like any one was left out, was great! It was unexpected and heart stopping! Great movie!
just watch it! the movie is the best super hero movie ever made and has the most original ending to date! You won't be disappointed.  This movie is worth watching a second or third time as well!

a spectacular movie with excellent actors and special effects. Still thinking about it weeks after viewing. What a grand film. Sure, you can nitpick criticisms, but when a movie is this fun, those are easily looked past. sit back, relax, you'll have a good time watching this movie

I was surprised at how serious and dramatic this movie was… The storyline had a depth to it that I wasn’t expecting, The actors performances were strong and the script worked. And, the CG and artwork were fantastic. It was just a moving experience all around.
I liked it a lot. Best super hero movie yet. Not quite sure how this movie got worse ratings than Black Panther... but it blows it out of the water! True 5 star for its category.
This movie made me so emotional. I loved it, i 100% recomend.
